events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to wrong product delivery; categorizing case under Refund.
Assigning this case to the customer support agent specialized in refunds and returns.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong product. Let's get this sorted out for you quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the received item and your order number so we can verify the issue?
Here is a photo of the product I got, which is completely different from what I ordered. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for you within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid label for the return.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
We have confirmed your refund has been processed and sent the return shipping label to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and were able to return the wrong item without any issues.
As the refund is complete and the return process finished, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
